DKDEPEND(libiconv-1.14)

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Libs/libxml2-2.9.8.zip libxml2-2.9.8)
DKSET(XML2 ${3RDPARTY}/libxml2-2.9.8)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${XML2})
DKINCLUDE(${XML2}/${OS})
DKINCLUDE(${XML2}/${OS}/Release)
ANDROID_INCLUDE(${XML2}/${OS}/$(BUILD_TYPE)/jni)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/Debug/xml2.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/Release/xml2.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libxml2.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libxml2.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/Debug/libxml2.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/Release/libxml2.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libxml2.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${XML2}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libxml2.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${XML2})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2.sln xml2)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2.sln xml2)

DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${X64GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /DWIN64 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${XML2})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2.sln xml2)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2.sln xml2)

DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS})
MAC_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 ${XML2})
MAC_XCODE_DEBUG(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2)
MAC_XCODE_RELEASE(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2)

DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS})
IOS_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS ${XML2})
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2)

DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS})
IOSSIM_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=SIMULATOR64 ${XML2})
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(libxml2-2.9.8 xml2)

DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS}/Debug)
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG ${XML2})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make xml2)

DKSETPATH(${XML2}/${OS}/Release)
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE ${XML2})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make xml2)

ANDROID_NDK_DEBUG(libxml2-2.9.8b)
ANDROID_NDK_RELEASE(libxml2-2.9.8)
